website_summaries.verdict: Logitech's hassle-free Wireless Music System bridges the gap between any MP3 player and your home stereo.
pros: Wirelessly transmits iPod music to your home stereo
lets you use iPod interface to navigate your music
transmitter doesn't draw power from your player
works with any iPod or MP3 player
cons: transmitter can snap on to only certain iPod models and just flops around on others
transmitter needs to be recharged separately from your MP3 player

customer_reviews.title: Great way to stream music through your house
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for the receiver only - to add to my existing Logitech "music anywhere" system which has the USB dongle to stream mp3s / WMAs from a pc. Now I have two receivers and so now two stereos (home theatre and stereo in back room) at opposite ends of my house can punch out playlists (at different times, can't pair with two bluetooth devices) depending on where I am working or relaxing. I've had both receivers working for close to 9 months now and apart from some very occasional interference from other nearby BlueTooth devices (I suspect in my neighbour's house) they've worked perfectly. Fantastic product, great sound, bargain price. About as good as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Green

customer_reviews.title: Best $35 I spent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at $35 bucks a month ago, WOW very amazing. This device can stream my ipod music from all corner of my house (1000sqm). No distortion at all. sound not much diff from plugging in. Unless u have audiophile ears u are not missing anything. This is one cheap way of having wireless music system can be able to control anywhere around the house. All for 35 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: WaterEarthSky

customer_reviews.title: Handy product
customer_reviews.text: We have a classic 1970's Kenwood stereo system with an auxiliary jack that allows us to use to play our iPod using this transmitter. Prior to this device, we were relegated to lp's and cd's. I call it the freedomaker! Just wish it had slightly farther range so we could take it out onto the deck. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Potato Tomato

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for years
customer_reviews.text: I originally had this and loved it. When it died I ordered another, which turned out to be defective. The seller cheerfully refunded my money, thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: Walkermom

customer_reviews.title: Really meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: I use the wireless system at school to save time and effort with the recordings I use with my music students. I plug it into my iPod or the headphone jack of my computer and it plays beautifully! I don't have to be in line of sight, either. It works flawlessly throughout my rather large room. A friend told me to be sure it worked if my iPod is in my pocket and I am folk dancing with the kids (lots of turning and movement.) IT DOES!!!
customer_reviews.author: BPL

customer_reviews.title: Very limited range
customer_reviews.text: It works okay if you are in the same room. With my ASUS tablet three feet from the living room door where the receiver was, it suffered frequent momentary sound distortion. I almost returned it.
customer_reviews.author: scott54

customer_reviews.title: Useful device
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something like this for more than a year, its simple easy to use and the most important thing WORKS WELL ! Good sound quality, no sound droping or gaps and I have tried it across doors and about 30 feet from base.
customer_reviews.author: Smartex

customer_reviews.title: poor execution. The transmitter is loosely attached to the ...
customer_reviews.text: High promise, poor execution. The transmitter is loosely attached to the mp3 player and spins around. After connecting to the receiver for the first time it now fails to connect any time. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Music
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I use it to throw Pandora radio from my PC to my stereo receiver in a completely different room. No messy wires and easy to setup. Would recommend purchasing this device.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I had to send the first one back. It cut out intermittently. It was promply replaced by J&R Electronics, and this one works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest G. Ryon

customer_reviews.title: this thing rocks!  it does what it is supposed to do...
customer_reviews.text: easy to hook up. you just need to charge the transmitter completely before doing anything else. btw, i did not get this for an ipod. i don't own one but i do have a different brand mp3 player and it works fine. it also works using the headphone jacks on my laptop. i figure anything with a headphone jack will work. and it sounds great. i use it right now to play music in the background while i work. definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: mix master i.c.e.

customer_reviews.title: Logitech wireless system for iPod works great
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my bedroom to connect my iPod to my Bose Wave Radio/CD. I keep the iPod on my nightstand and the bose is located across the room (about 15 feet). The bed is between the units, so they do not have line-of-sight connectivity. The wireless bluetooth transmitter is able to locate the unit without issue and trasmits music clearly. This is very convenient since I can now control my iPod at night to listen to music without having to get up to change tracks, etc. I set both the iPod and Bose radio to go to sleep automatically after 90 minutes. The logitech detects when the iPod is off and shuts itself off after a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Private123

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect alternative to either the Griffin Tunecenter or the DLO Home Dock Deluxe, if you don't care about displaying pictures and video on your TV. Instead of your iPod being wired to your stereo and TV (to allow you to see where you are browsing) and having a remote control to browse, the iPod now BECOMES the remote control! The sound quality is excellent... no loss of frequency range at all. It sounds just like it was wired up. And I'm pretty picky about sound quality. Plus, it is not iPod-specific. You can use it with anything outputting an audio signal. I have even used it as a wireless system for my guitar.
customer_reviews.author: ManDrugMachine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product so that I can use any device in my house to control my outdoor speakers. Having read other reviews, I expected there to be no sound loss in the transmission, but still I am impressed with the sound quality. The only drawback is the 30-feet distance limit, but that is a Bluetooth limitation, and worth the tradeoff from a FM transmission system.
customer_reviews.author: Cory D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up...works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with the intent of streaming music from my computer to my relatively antiquated (4+ year old) home audio system and I'm delighted with it. It is easy to set up, works like a charm and meets my needs. I can now use the content and functionality of ipod, itunes or Windows Media Player to stream music and playlists to my receiver.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sanghani

product_meta.title: Logitech Wireless Music System for iPod
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingListen to your iPod or MP3 player through your stereo system! With the Logitech Wireless Music System music is transmitted wirelessly from your iPod or MP3 to your stereo system. You can use your device to select a playlist, change tracks, and even adjust the volume, all without wires! Operating on 2.4 GHz wireless frequency enables you to listen to music anywhere in your home without wires getting in the way. The wireless transmitter even has its own rechargeable battery, so it won't drain the battery on your MP3 or Ipod.

AMAZON.COM
Listen to your iTunes anywhere in your home! It's never been easier to stream audio files wirelessly from your iPod.to your home stereo system. It's as simply as plug and play. Just plug the wireless transmitter into your iPod, plug the music receiver into your stereo system, and press Play on your iPod. It's your music - anywhere! 

 Easy to Set up:

 

Plug
Plug the transmitter into your iPod. Plug
Plug the music receiver to your stereo system.

 Play
From your iPod, open your favorite playlist and press "Play."

 Enjoy
Sit back, relax and enjoy your music!

 

Everything you need comes in the box! 

Wireless transmitter for iPod 
(With AC adaptor for charging.) Plugs into the headphone jack on your iPod.  Music Receiver
(With AC adapter for charging.) Connects to either your home stereo or powered multimedia speakers. Includes standard RCA and stereo-mini (3.5mm) jacks.

 

Easy to control: Music is transmitted wirelessly from your iPod to your stereo system, and you can use your iPod to select a playlist, change tracks, and even adjust the volume - all without wires. The wireless transmitter even has its own rechargeable battery, so it won't drain the battery on your iPod. 

 Features

 

 * Enjoy full control of your iPod music library from anywhere in the room. Wireless range extends to 33 feet! 
 * Easy to set up. Everything you need is in the box. 
 * Connect it to any type of speaker system. Use it with your home stereo or powered multimedia speakers. 
 * Don´t worry about draining your iPod´s battery. Wireless transmitter has its own rechargeable battery. 
 * Use it with any MP3 player. Plugs into any player with a standard (3.5mm) headphone jack. 
 * Expand your system to multiple rooms. Music receivers for additional speaker systems are available. 

System Requirements iPod or MP3 Player: 
Any portable music player with standard 3.5mm headphone output

 Speakers: 
Any home stereo system with stereo RCA input jacks, OR 
Any powered multimedia speaker system with a stereo-mini input jack 

 Package Contents

 

 * Wireless transmitter for iPod (with AC adapter for charging) 
 * Music receiver for stereo system (with AC adapter) 
 * Stereo RCA interconnect cables 
 * Remote control 
 * Quick-start guide 
 * 2-year limited warranty
feature_bullets: Wirelessly transmits iPod songs right to your stereo system
Turns your iPod into a wireless stereo remote
Compatible with iPod 3G, iPod Mini, iPod 4G/U2, iPod 4G Color; backed by a 2-year warranty
